dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: We're approaching the planet of Xylophia-IV. Prepare for landing.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Good. Our mission is to retrieve a rare mineral found only on this planet. Let's move quickly and get in and out.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Thane
dialogues.text: Captain, I'm reading some strange energy signatures coming from the planet's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Keep scanning, Lieutenant. We don't want any surprises waiting for us down there.
